selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract ages from the image text.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract the text from the image to obtain the ages of Person 1 and Person 2.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the age gap as the difference between the extracted ages.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to calculate the difference between the ages of Person 1 and Person 2 to find the age gap.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the computed age gap into the final answer format.
